name: Delphinus - Creative Multi-Purpose eCommerce HTML5
intro: Thank you for your purchasing this template. If you have any questions that are beyond the scope of this help file, please feel free to email us via our user page contact form.

sections.title: FAQ
sections.content:
How to enable/ disable loading page?

If you want to enable loading page in your pages, add the following code in the head tag.

<!-- Javascript Page Loader -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="assets/js/pace.min.js" data-pace-options='{ "ajax": false }'></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="assets/js/page-loading.js"></script>

sections.title: HTML Structure
sections.content:
This template, which is a responsive layout for tablet and other mobile devices, is based on the HTML5 structure and Twitter Bootstrap 3. Visit http://getbootstrap.com/ to learn more about Bookstrap. For a detailed information about its grid system, click on http://getbootstrap.com/css/#grid.

 

The general HTML structure should appear in the following format.

<div id="page">
    <header id="header" class="header-shadow header-full-center">
        <div class="topbar">
            <!-- HEADER CONTENT GOES HERE (logo, page info, menu, ribbon, etc) -->
        </div>
    </header>
    <div class="page-section bg-gray small-section">
        <div class="page-header">
            <!-- PAGE TITLE SECTION(Inner section) -->
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="main">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-sm-9">
                    <!-- MAIN CONTENT GOES HERE (search box, etc) -->
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-3 side-bar side-bar-right">
                    <!-- SIDEBAR CONTENT GOES HERE -->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
        <footer id="footer-top">
            <!-- FOOTER TOP CONTENT GOES HERE -->
        </footer>
        <footer id="footer-area">
            <!-- FOOTER AREA CONTENT GOES HERE -->
        </footer>
        <div class="footer-copyright">
            <!-- LOGO, COPYRIGHT, BACK TO TOP, etc -->
        </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

sections.title: CSS Structure
sections.content:
This template uses SCSS for stylesheets. For more information about SCSS, visit http://sass-lang.com/guide.

We need to compile SCSS files to CSS to make them usable.

  • style.scss - Main style file (all styles are located in this file)
  • responsive.scss - This stylesheet contains responsive rules for adapting the template to any resolution.
  • custom.scss - Custom style file. We would recommend you to write your rules and style declarations here.
  • updates.scss - Updated styles for further versions
  • ie.scss - This stylesheet contains the fixes for Internet Explorer browser (exactly IE8, 9)
  • _mixin.scss - We have defined mixins for its use in style.scss. Therefore, there is no no need to compile this file.
  • _variables.scss - This file defines variables which are used in style.scss. For more information, please check the Customization section.

sections.title: Javascript
sections.content:
This template imports several JS files.

The Javascript  files are loaded in the footer.

The Javascript files used in this template are the following:

  1. jQuery library
  2. Bootstrap JS
  3. Main scripts (main.js) - It contains all the scripts we are using in the template. To get a detailed understanding of this, please have a look at this file that contains an explanation written in comment.
  4. Other Javascript plugins (Check details in the Sources section)

sections.title: Customization
sections.content:
Changing Logo

Change a default logo by changing logo.png in the /images directory, or by opening each of the pages and changing the following code.



<div class="branding">
    <h1 class="logo">
        <a href="index.php"><img alt="Delphinus" title="Delphinus" src="assets/images/logo.png"></a>
    </h1>
</div>


	The logo is 30px in height by default. If you want to change the logo height, please add the following css code in the /css/custom.css. (Change 30px with your logo height.)


.branding img { height: 30px; }



	 



	Changing fonts


	We are using Google Open Sans font by default.


	To change the embedded font, look for the tag below in the head tag of your website.


<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,300,600,700' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>


	Once you see the $font-stack variable in /scss/_variables.scss, change the value of which and compile the style again.


$font-stack: 'Open Sans', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;


	In addition to this default font, we are using several other google fonts for some html components.



	 



	Changing header style


	There are 4 header styles.

	

	To change header style, you need to change all inner style sections to another style of your choice.

	

	Please have a look at pages-header-style1.php, pages-header-style2.php, pages-header-style3.php, pages-header-style3.php.


	 



	Changing footer style


	There are 3 footer styles.

	

	To change footer style, you need to change all inner style sections to another style of your choice.

	

	Please have a look at pages-footer-style1.php, pages-footer-style2.php, pages-footer-style3.php.


	 



	Icons


	Font Awesome is a @font-face iconset of which you can change size and color using CSS.

	IcoMoon is a @font-face iconset of which you can change size and color using CSS.

	

	If you need more information, please visit the site: http://fontawesome.io/, https://icomoon.io/

sections.title: Sliders and Carousels
sections.content:
Home page slider

Click here to get the Text you need to copy

 

Click here to get the Text you need to copy

 

Click here to get the Text you need to copy

 

OwlCarousel

We can make responsive image carousel using OwlCarousel. http://owlgraphic.com/owlcarousel

<div class="owl-carousel-kt no-gutters navigation-center-inner no-margin">
    <div class="owl-carousel kt-owl-carousel" data-options='{"pagination": false, "navigation": true, "desktop": 3, "desktopsmall": 2, "tablet" : 2, "mobile" : 1}'>
        <div class="client-item"><a href="#"><img src="assets/images/client/client-01.png" class="img-responsive" alt=""/> </a></div>
        <div class="client-item"><a href="#"><img src="assets/images/client/client-02.png" class="img-responsive" alt=""/> </a></div>
    </div>
</div>
Attributes:
  • navigation (boolean): Display "next" and "prev" buttons.
  • navigationText (array): You can cusomize your own text for navigation. To get empty buttons use navigationText : false. Also HTML can be used here
  • mouseDrag (boolean): Turn off/on mouse events.
  • touchDrag (boolean): Turn off/on touch events.
  • transitionStyle: Add CSS3 transition style. Works only with one item on screen. See Demo

sections.content:
